markdownRemark.html: Nursery School, Pre-School and Primary School following the Rudolf Steiner education system where that strives to develop pupils' intellectual, artistic, and practical skills in an integrated and holistic manner. The cultivation of pupils' imagination and creativity is a central focus.

frontmatter.title: El Farol - International Waldorf-Steiner School
frontmatter.description: El Farol - International Waldorf-Steiner School - Nursery School, Pre-School and Primary School following the Rudolf Steiner education system where that strives to develop pupils' intellectual, artistic, and practical skills in an integrated and holistic manner. The cultivation of pupils' imagination and creativity is a central focus.
